idea-plugin.name: Catappult Billing Integration
idea-plugin.change-notes: Added Server to Server Check documentation
idea-plugin.description:
The Catappult Billing Method Integration Plugin for Android Studio allows seamless integration of the Catappult Billing SDK or OSP into your Android applications. With this plugin, you can easily enable in-app purchases and subscriptions while leveraging the power of Catappult's billing system. Simplify your billing implementation and enhance your users' purchasing experience today!

  • Effortlessly integrate both OSP and SDK billing methods into your Android projects.
  • Native Android Billing Documentation: Access the comprehensive Catappult documentation right within Android Studio to assist your integration process.
  • Code Snippets: Effortlessly add billing-related code snippets to your app with a single click.
  • Automatic Google Play to Catappult Transition: Automatically replace Google Play billing calls with Catappult's billing calls.
